name: Block Journey
description:
Block Journey is a simple and addictive building block puzzle game.

How to play?
1. Drag the wood block and put it in the appropriate position on the grid.
2. Eliminate the wood block by forming full lines in the horizontal or vertical direction!
3. Use props to change the direction of the block to get a higher score.
4. Level up to unlock beautiful pictures.

Why play Block Journey？
- Free to play!
- No WIFI? No problem, you can play anytime and anywhere.
- No time limit, no pressure!
- Over 1000+ levels and lots of beautiful pictures.


If you have good suggestions and ideas, you can contact us at where2gogogogo@gmail.com. Thank you all for your support of our game.
